statements: SELECT * FROM economic_benefits_of_gmos;
SELECT crop_name, gmo_trait, yield_increase FROM economic_benefits_of_gmos ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT profit_increase, crop_name FROM economic_benefits_of_gmos WHERE gmo_trait = 'drought resistance';
SELECT AVG(yield_increase) AS avg_yield_increase, MAX(profit_increase) AS max_profit_increase FROM economic_benefits_of_gmos;
SELECT * FROM economic_benefits_of_gmos WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT crop_name, gmo_trait, yield_increase, profit_increase FROM economic_benefits_of_gmos WHERE profit_increase > 1000 ORDER BY crop_name ASC
SELECT * FROM economic_benefits_of_gmos WHERE yield_increase > 5 AND profit_increase > 5000
SELECT gmo_trait, AVG(yield_increase) AS avg_yield_increase FROM economic_benefits_of_gmos GROUP BY gmo_trait ORDER BY avg_yield_increase DESC
SELECT * FROM economic_benefits_of_gmos WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC
SELECT crop_name, gmo_trait FROM economic_benefits_of_gmos WHERE yield_increase > 10 AND profit_increase > 8000 ORDER BY profit_increase DESC, yield_increase DESC
SELECT * FROM Economic_Benefits;
SELECT Crop_Name, Economic_Value FROM Economic_Benefits WHERE GMO_Use = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Statistical_Analysis ORDER BY Sample_Size DESC;
SELECT COUNT(Analysis_ID) AS Analysis_Count FROM Statistical_Analysis;
SELECT Experiment_Date, Sample_Size, Result FROM Statistical_Analysis WHERE Result > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Economic_Benefits WHERE Crop_Name = 'Corn';
SELECT * FROM Economic_Benefits WHERE Economic_Value > 1000 ORDER BY Crop_Name DESC;
SELECT AVG(Economic_Value) AS Average_Value, Crop_Name FROM Economic_Benefits GROUP BY Crop_Name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT Crop_Name, GMO_Use, Economic_Value FROM Economic_Benefits WHERE GMO_Use = TRUE ORDER BY Economic_Value DESC;
SELECT Analysis_ID, Experiment_Date, Result FROM Statistical_Analysis WHERE Sample_Size >= 50 ORDER BY Experiment_Date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Economic_Benefits;
SELECT crop_name, yield_increase FROM Economic_Benefits WHERE gmo_used = true;
SELECT crop_name, profit_increase FROM Economic_Benefits WHERE profit_increase > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Cost_Analysis ORDER BY gmo_cost DESC;
SELECT crop_name, yield_obtained FROM Field_Trials WHERE trial_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Economic_Benefits ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT crop_name, yield_increase FROM Economic_Benefits WHERE gmo_used = TRUE;
SELECT AVG(yield_increase) AS avg_yield_increase, AVG(profit_increase) AS avg_profit_increase FROM Economic_Benefits;
SELECT crop_name, gmo_cost, non_gmo_cost FROM Cost_Analysis WHERE gmo_cost > non_gmo_cost;
SELECT trial_date, crop_name, yield_obtained FROM Field_Trials WHERE gmo_field = TRUE ORDER BY trial_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM economic_benefits_of_gmos;
SELECT id, crop_name, gmo_effectiveness FROM economic_benefits_of_gmos ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT crop_name, economic_benefits FROM economic_benefits_of_gmos WHERE gmo_effectiveness > 0.8;
SELECT farm_name, location, total_acres FROM farm_data WHERE gmo_usage = TRUE;
SELECT analysis_date, benefits_score, analysis_result FROM economic_analysis ORDER BY benefits_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM farm_data;
SELECT crop_name, yield_per_acre FROM crop_production_data WHERE production_year = 2021;
SELECT economic_benefits FROM economic_benefits_of_gmos WHERE gmo_effectiveness > 0.8 ORDER BY economic_benefits DESC;
SELECT farm_name, location, total_acres FROM farm_data WHERE gmo_usage = TRUE;
SELECT MAX(benefits_score) AS max_benefits_score, MIN(benefits_score) AS min_benefits_score FROM economic_analysis;
SELECT * FROM economic_benefits;
SELECT publication_date, conclusion, impact_on_farmers FROM research_results;
SELECT crop_planted, region, gmo_usage_status FROM farmers_data WHERE region = 'Midwest';
SELECT experiment_id, researcher_name, start_date, end_date FROM experiment_logs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT survey_id, question, response, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE response_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM economic_benefits;
SELECT crop_name, profit_increase FROM economic_benefits WHERE gmo_status='Yes';
SELECT * FROM farmers_data WHERE region='North';
SELECT study_id, publication_date FROM research_results ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT researcher_name, start_date, end_date FROM experiment_logs WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
